listener
Class ListenedDirectory

java.lang.Object
  listener.ListenedDirectory

public class ListenedDirectory
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a directory available for listening, enabling definition of regular expressions for files that should be watched.

Author:
Or Shwartz

 java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getRegularExpressions()
